I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
n: nat
zero: pos n
src: pos n
Hsz: src <> zero
i: nat

Goal:
length (mm_null i) = 2

Premises:
mm_null = fun i : nat => DECₐ src (2 + i) :: DECₐ zero i :: nil : nat -> list (mm_instr (pos n)) Arguments mm_null _%nat_scope
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Notation pos := Fin.t
Fin.of_nat_ext : forall h h' : ?p < ?n, Fin.of_nat_lt h = Fin.of_nat_lt h' where ?p : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat] ?n : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : pos ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (w : vec ?B n0) (p1 p2 p3 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?C : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> vec ?C n0 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?C : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A n0) (p1 p2 : pos n0), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v p2) where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type]
Fin.FS_inj : forall x y : pos ?n, pos_nxt x = pos_nxt y -> x = y where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
Fin.of_nat_to_nat_inv : forall p : pos ?m, Fin.of_nat_lt (proj2_sig (Fin.to_nat p)) = p where ?m : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type]
Fin.to_nat_inj : forall p q : pos ?n, proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat p) = proj1_sig (Fin.to_nat q) -> p = q where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
pos_S_inv : forall p : pos (S ?n), (p = pos0) + {q : pos ?n | p = pos_nxt q} where ?n : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
VectorDef.caseS' : forall (v : vec ?A (S ?n)) (P : vec ?A (S ?n) -> Type), (forall (h : ?A) (t : vec ?A ?n), P (h ## t)) -> P v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?n : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
Fin.L_R : forall n0 : nat, pos ?m -> pos (n0 + ?m) where ?m : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- nat]
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A n0 -> vec ?B n0 -> Type, P 0 vec_nil vec_nil -> (forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (S n0) (a ## v1) (b ## v2)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v1 : vec ?A n0) (v2 : vec ?B n0), P n0 v1 v2 where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type] ?B : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n0 : nat) (t : vec ?A n0), P n0 (h ## t)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type]
VectorDef.rectS : forall P : forall n0 : nat, vec ?A (S n0) -> Type, (forall a : ?A, P 0 (a ## vec_nil)) -> (forall (a : ?A) (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v -> P (S n0) (a ## v)) -> forall (n0 : nat) (v : vec ?A (S n0)), P n0 v where ?A : [n : nat src : pos n zero : pos n Hsz : src <> zero i : nat |- Type]
pos_eq_dec : forall (n : nat) (x y : pos n), {x = y} + {x <> y}
vec_one_spec_neq : forall (n : nat) (p q : pos n), p <> q -> vec_one p#>q = 0
nth_error_Some : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat), nth_error l n <> None < -> n < length l
partition_length : forall (A : Type) (f : A -> bool) (l l1 l2 : list A), partition f l = (l1, l2) -> length l = length l1 + length l2
app_length : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), length (l ++ l') = length l + length l'
vec_change_neq : forall (X : Type) (n : nat) (v : vec X n) (p q : pos n) (x : X), p <> q -> v[x/p]#>q = v#>q
rev_length : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), length (rev l) = length l
prod_length : forall (A B : Type) (l : list A) (l' : list B), length (list_prod l l') = length l * length l'
Fin.to_nat = fix to_nat (m : nat) (n : pos m) {struct n} : {i : nat | i < m} := match n in (pos n0) return {i : nat | i < n0} with | @Fin.F1 j => exist (fun i : nat => i < S j) 0 (Nat.lt_0_succ j) | @Fin.FS n0 p => let (i, P) := to_nat n0 p in exist (fun i0 : nat => i0 < S n0) (S i) (lt_n_S i n0 P) end : forall m : nat, pos m -> {i : nat | i < m} Arguments Fin.to_nat {m}%nat_scope
split_length_l : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)), length (fst (split l)) = length l
split_length_r : forall (A B : Type) (l : list (A * B)), length (snd (split l)) = length l
Permutation.Permutation_length : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' -> length l = length l'
length_nil : forall X : Type, length nil = 0
skipn_length : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A), length (skipn n l) = length l - n
map_length : forall (A B : Type) (f : A -> B) (l : list A), length (map f l) = length l
length_zero_iff_nil : forall (A : Type) (l : list A), length l = 0 < -> l = nil
pos_list_length : forall n : nat, length (pos_list n) = n
firstn_length_le : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat), n <= length l -> length (firstn n l) = n
list_split_length : forall (X : Type) (ll : list X) (k : nat), k <= length ll -> {l : list X & {r : list X | ll = l ++ r /\ length l = k}}
seq_length : forall len start : nat, length (seq start len) = len
list_an_length : forall a n : nat, length (list_an a n) = n
BinInt.Z.le = fun x y : BinNums.Z => BinInt.Z.compare x y <> Gt : BinNums.Z -> BinNums.Z -> Prop Arguments BinInt.Z.le (_ _)%Z_scope
nth_split : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
Permutation.Permutation_nth_error : forall (A : Type) (l l' : list A), l ~p l' < -> length l = length l' /\ (exists f : nat -> nat, FinFun.Injective f /\ (forall n : nat, nth_error l' n = nth_error l (f n)))
VectorSpec.replace_replace_neq : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (p1 p2 : pos n) (v : vec A n) (a b : A), p1 <> p2 -> VectorDef.replace (VectorDef.replace v p1 a) p2 b = VectorDef.replace (VectorDef.replace v p2 b) p1 a
